summary:
Become a Volkihar Vampire and Vampire Lord without the Dawnguard quest
But in an easier way. This mod tries to do that with a little background story and a short quest.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Castellar][color=#DAA520][size=22]Vampire Lord without Dawnguard-Quest[/size][/color][/font]

This is my first ever mod.
Become a Volkihar Vampire and Vampire Lord without the Dawnguard quest
But in an easier way. This mod tries to do that with a little background story and a short quest.
I tried to make it as lore-friendly as possible.

To start this mod: Search in the rooms at the four shields tavern in Dragon Bridge. 

[color=red]
--------------------------------------------------------------
*****         DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED!       *****
--------------------------------------------------------------
[/color][color=#DAA520]
--------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Castellar]INSTALLATION[/font]
--------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
- Use NMM to install
- Install manually:
  Drop both VLWD.esp and VLWD.bsa in Skyrims data folder. 
- Make sure the .esp file is activated
[color=#DAA520]
--------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Castellar]UNINSTALLATION[/font]
-------------------------------------------------------------- [/color]
- Use NMM to uninstall
- Uninstall manually:
  Remove both VLWD.esp and VLWD.bsa out of skyrims data folder.
[color=#DAA520]
--------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Castellar]CREDITS[/font]
-------------------------------------------------------------- [/color]
This mod is created by TPwise

Thanks to:
The kind people of the creation kit forums for helping me out with my first ever mod.
MCtag for helping me with the text, seen in the mod.
author: TPwise

files.name: Vampire Lord without Dawnguard-Quest
files.changelogHtml: Fixed the bug where the item wouldn't show up.
